ygData.messageBody:
you are running a bar Ralph? How did you do that? I am very interested in this.
thanks
Melefante 16/ranger/tribunal server
"(Ralph) Clay" wrote:I am a little new to Everquest but I love the game. I am , right now
running a Shaman Bar. 11th level by the name of Fireefrost on the Xev
server. RIght now I am trying to rid the world of Sick Bear and Wolf
( and getting the PP and exp's for turning in the belts). I am slowly
riseing in levels but enjoying every sec. of it . hope to talk to you
all later.

Fireefrost
Healer for the lands of Ice
